query.statement: SELECT B.CONSUM_YN, B.ITEM_CLASS1, B.ITEM_CLASS2, B.ITEM_CLASS3, B.ITEM_CLASS4 , B.ITEM_CODE, B.ITEM_NAME, B.ITEM_SIZE, B.PO_UOM, B.TAX_CODE , B.KG_CONVERT_RATE, B.MIN_ORD_QTY, B.POINT_FLAG, B.MULTIPLIER_QTY , B.ITEM_CODE AS ORI_ITEM_CODE , 'PO' AS CODE_KIND , '0000' AS OTCUSTCD , B.USE_YN FROM HLDC_PO_ITEM_MST B, HLDC_PO_TREAT_UPJANG A WHERE A.ITEM_CODE = B.ITEM_CODE AND B.ITEM_CODE BETWEEN '010000000000' AND '019999999999' AND A.UPJANG = (SELECT C.AP_UNITPRICE_UPJANG FROM HLDC_ST_UPJANG C WHERE C.UPJANG = #UPJANG#) AND B.CONSUM_YN = NVL(#CONSUM_YN#,B.CONSUM_YN) AND B.ITEM_CLASS2 = NVL(#ITEM_CLASS2#,B.ITEM_CLASS2) AND B.ITEM_CLASS3 = NVL(#ITEM_CLASS3#,B.ITEM_CLASS3) AND B.ITEM_CLASS4 = NVL(#ITEM_CLASS4#,B.ITEM_CLASS4) AND B.ITEM_CODE LIKE #ITEM_CODE#||'%' AND B.ITEM_NAME LIKE '%'||#ITEM_NAME#||'%' UNION ALL SELECT A.CONSUM_YN, A.ITEM_CLASS1, A.ITEM_CLASS2, A.ITEM_CLASS3, A.ITEM_CLASS4 , A.ITEM_CODE, A.ITEM_NAME, A.ITEM_SIZE, A.PO_UOM, A.TAX_CODE , A.KG_CONVERT_RATE, A.MIN_ORD_QTY, A.POINT_FLAG, A.MULTIPLIER_QTY , A.ORI_ITEM_CODE , 'OT' AS CODE_KIND , A.OTCUSTCD , A.USE_YN FROM FMP_OTCUST_ITEM A, FMP_OTCUST_PRICE_AVA_V B ,(SELECT UPJANG, ITEM_CODE, MAX(SDATE) AS SDATE FROM FMP_OTCUST_PRICE_AVA_V WHERE UPJANG = (SELECT Z.OTCUST_PRICE_UPJANG FROM FMS_UPJANG Z WHERE Z.UPJANG = #UPJANG#) AND SDATE <= NVL(#SDATE#,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')) GROUP BY UPJANG, ITEM_CODE) C WHERE A.ITEM_CODE = B.ITEM_CODE AND B.UPJANG = C.UPJANG AND B.SDATE = C.SDATE AND B.ITEM_CODE = C.ITEM_CODE AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND A.CONSUM_YN = NVL(#CONSUM_YN#,A.CONSUM_YN) AND A.ITEM_CLASS2 = NVL(#ITEM_CLASS2#,A.ITEM_CLASS2) AND A.ITEM_CLASS3 = NVL(#ITEM_CLASS3#,A.ITEM_CLASS3) AND A.ITEM_CLASS4 = NVL(#ITEM_CLASS4#,A.ITEM_CLASS4) AND A.ITEM_CODE LIKE #ITEM_CODE#||'%' AND A.ITEM_NAME LIKE '%'||#ITEM_NAME#||'%'
